TopicTitle: Thanks to everyone who joined in on the KSPumpkin fun!

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://on.fb.me/1tsA2Fc"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/2884ee73ca4846a038e21dc0510c5f21/tumblr_inline_nediqzl0zs1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p>@NefariousPlots’ Kerbal costume is one of our many favorite KSPumpkin entries, which we’ve included in an <a href="http://on.fb.me/1tsA2Fc"><strong>ALBUM</strong></a> on our Facebook page. We’d like to thank everyone who participated. There were many great entries, but only one will win. That winner will be announced soon!</p>
Lots 'a pumpkins there! I don't understand how people can carve those things so accurately.

Lots 'a pumpkins there! I don't understand how people can carve those things so accurately.

Very, very, very sharp tools.
